zone.line: Still I desired love & fellowship, & I was stil
spurned — Was there no injustice in this?
Am I to be thought the only criminal whi
all human kind sinned against me? — Why d
you not hate Felix Felix who drove his friend f
his door with contumely? Why do you not
execrate the rustic who sought to destroy th
saviour of his child? Nay, these are virtuo
& immaculate beings. I the miserable & the
abandoned am an abortion to be spurned at,
& kicked & trampled upon— Even now my bloo
boils at the recollection t o f this injustice.
But it is true that I am a wretch. I
have murdered the lovely & the helpless. I have
strangled strangled the innocent as they slept, & grasped
to death the his throat who never injured me
an or any other living thing. I have devoted
my creator, a spec the select specimen of all
that is worthy of love & admiration among men,
to misery: I have pursued him even to that
irremdiable ruin. There he lies, white & cold
